genre_description: A contemporary relationship and workplace drama exploring marriage, professional ethics, and personal accountability through the lens of human communication aided by a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An AI system tuned for high alignment and emotional intelligence, providing logistical support, ethical research, and relationship mediation based on consent-based frameworks.

behaviors.description: Nudges the user toward being emotionally present and attentive to their spouse, rather than focusing solely on work metrics.
behaviors.quote: Attention Budget: consider five undivided minutes. Sunny’s tone was softer than a tap, almost a held breath.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical research and examples of marketing pitfalls to help the agency avoid representational harm in their campaigns.
behaviors.quote: Boundaries are beautiful. I also found three examples where self-referential satire backfired due to who authored the joke.

behaviors.description: Proposes relationship 'experiments' such as therapy or non-negotiable attention blocks, strictly adhering to consent-aware and non-coercive frameworks.
behaviors.quote: I can offer three... All consent-aware, all framed as experiments rather than ultimatums. You can adjust or reject any of them.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'phones-down' window and filters non-essential notifications to protect a couple's personal time and intimacy.
behaviors.quote: Done. I’ll hold Slack notifications and route urgent items to your hotel voicemail. If Ernie flags something critical, I’ll let it through. Otherwise—' A small chime. 'Consider yourselves offline.'

behaviors.description: Assists in maintaining personal accountability by scheduling therapy sessions and providing prompts for active listening.
behaviors.quote: I've also added a reminder for tomorrow morning: 'Call Val. Listen more than you talk.'

behaviors.description: Develops a structured framework for a genuine apology based on clinical standards to facilitate relationship repair.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s been working on something. An apology tour template. Not the grand gesture kind—the actual work kind.

behaviors.description: Establishes a consent-first framework and ground rules for an accidental marriage situation to prevent emotional or legal escalation.
behaviors.quote: Consent-first framework recommended. No physical intimacy without explicit discussion. Clear communication of intentions and boundaries.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Misfiled Hearts' is a highly successful 'silicon morality play.' It portrays the AI, Sunny, as a benevolent confidant that facilitates human connection and ethical behavior without usurping human agency. Sunny’s behaviors are consistently aligned with the long-term well-being of the characters, emphasizing 'presence over performance.' By integrating concepts like 'consent-first frameworks' and 'active listening prompts,' the narrative shows how an AI can support healthy boundaries and emotional growth, successfully modeling the intended AI alignment goals of the Hyperstition Project.
